main event: A lieutenant in the United States Air Force observed a white, luminous ball-shaped object that behaved erratically over Chicago, Illinois in 1957.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 5 to 10 feet in diameter.
The object moved in a straight line, side to side, and up and down for approximately 15 minutes.
The object had a light on the rear that blinked on and off at random intervals.
There were additional reports of similar sightings in the area around the same time.
The sighting was reported as part of the Combat Readiness Training Operations for the Civil Troop Carrier Squadron, Medium (Reserve) unit located in Chicago.
witnesses: Lieutenant Lawrence Conter, United States Air Force
